com.github.mlefeb01.spigotutils.api.command

Class AbstractCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mlefeb01.spigotutils.api.command.AbstractCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractCmdHelp, AbstractCmdReload

    public abstract class AbstractCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor
    Wraps CommandExecutor to make creating commands significantly easier.
